channel.title: 508 question
channel.description:
So, recently i got an idea, but i need you're help to realize i't! Please help me. I might release my fucking awsome christmas event if you help me on this.
By leading to this tutorial http://www.ruun.org/f412/508-full-chat-100-t88796.html (chat tutorial) i added chat to my server, but does anyone got any idea how could i add i't so ONLY admins could view the text peoples are chatting about (admisn could see the chat, but regular users coudnt).
Thanks! -Matt
